original_text: But now even more the report about him went abroad, and great crowds gathered to hear him and to be healed of their infirmities.
korean_text: 예수의 소문이 더욱 퍼지매 수많은 무리가 말씀도 듣고 자기 병도 고침을 받고자 하여 모여 오되

sentences.original_text: But now even more the report about him went abroad
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 그에 대한 소문이 더욱 퍼져나갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and great crowds gathered to hear him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 큰 무리가 그의 말씀을 듣기 위해 모였습니다

sentences.original_text: and to be healed of their infirmities.
